name: Lovely Sweet Dream
description:
Welcome to Lovely Sweet Dream! A game made for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 5! Inspired by Yume Nikki and LSD Dream Emulator.

A girl called Lulu is walking home from school one day when she finds an interesting looking charm at a flea market. The box describes that the charm will give the user wonderful dreams. Intrigued, Lulu takes the charm home and it introduces itself as LOVELY. With LOVELY's power, Lulu can explore its beautiful and happy dreams.

Your goal is to simply explore however, there might be something special waiting for you if you collect five of LOVELY's presents.

(Likely to be updated with new content in the future!)

Controls:

Walk: Arrow keys or click screen

Enter menu and cancel: X

Interact and confirm: Z/Enter

Run: Shift key

Guide:

Collect all five costumes from presents gifted to Lulu by LOVELY. (Hint, they are yellow and white coloured)

Lulu can wake up and change costume in the items section of the menu. A certain item - not costume - can teleport Lulu back to the Nexus.

There are four different endings to see based on items collected and choices made.

Contains themes of suicide and has some scary moments. Please continue with caution if things like that upset you. (Don't worry though, no one gets hurt!)

Map with costume and event locations: https://dreamerkitty.tumblr.com/post/655138207213764608/a-map-for-lovely-sweet-d...

Info and guide for all effects and endings on the Yume Nikki Fangame wiki: https://yumenikkifg.fandom.com/wiki/Lovely_Sweet_Dream
